Row.Text: Hail traveler. I am Hermann Von Salza, Hochmeister of the Teutonic Order. I don't expect any problems as long as you recognize Christ as your savior.
How could God allow such tragedy to occur?
Speak quickly servant of Satan. I fear your sinfulness will rub off on my men.
God wills that we destroy you and so we shall.
A devil must have possessed you for you to promulgate such profanity towards a soldier of Christ.

You are a heathenous fool that regrets God's grace. You have condemned yourself to hell with your unreedemable sins and we will ensure you arrive there soon.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
A most holy leader such as yourself would be a great ally to the Order.
We will fight until the Lord demands that we stop.
Send back your blasphemous pagans immediately!
War is a crime and you shall be punished for it. I will order my men not just to fight, but to die until you've been defeated.
